response.overview: At the end of the seventies, in the throes of the Franco dictatorship, Paco Fernández, the teacher of Orellana la Vieja, created Escuela Viva. A renewing pedagogical experience, an assembly school model within a public school. Julián Pavón, a young university student, shot a 16mm short film with an old wind-up camera in 1976. about the experience and projects it in the different cultural athenaeums of Madrid. 25 years later, Julián Pavón himself searches through former students, former teachers and theorists, the echoes of that movement and its reflection in another current experience .
response.title: Escuela viva
